item.title: Ellie Goulding,Diplo,Red Velvet - Close To Me (Red Velvet Remix)
item.description:
Even though we both
know we’re liars
And we start
each other’s fires
We just know
that we’ll be alright
Even though we’re
kicked out the party
‘Cause we both
hate everybody
We’re the ones
they wanna be like
So don’t let me down
keep me in trouble

out in the jungle
And I don’t wanna
be somebody

close to me

I wouldn’t want

close to me
‘Cause I’m an animal

like you

be somebody
